bibl.title: The Ptolemaic economy, institutions, economic integration, and the limits of centralized political power
bibl.note: Introduction. - Institutions. - The Ptolemaic state. - The reach of the state, state formation, and economic integration. - An overview of the Ptolemaic economy. - Structure of the economy. - The land tenure regime. - Economic performance and the limits of centralization. - Conclusions.
bibl.seg: MANNING Joe G., The Ptolemaic Economy, Institutions, Economic Integration, and the Limits of Centralized Political Power.
[Raymond DESCAT (Éd.)], Approches de l'économie hellénistique = Entretiens d'archéologie et d'histoire. 7 (Saint-Bertrand-de-Comminges, 2006) pp. 257-274.

Introduction. - Institutions. - The Ptolemaic state. - The reach of the state, state formation, and economic integration. - An overview of the Ptolemaic economy. - Structure of the economy. - The land tenure regime. - Economic performance and the limits of centralization. - Conclusions.
